title: When your lane opponent is a lore matchup

replies.body:
We live on a rift

Bottom lane
How is {{champion:222}}  vs {{champion:51}}  missing from that list?

Was mentioned but {{champion:58}} vs {{champion:75}} ....
And to be fair {{champion:58}} + {{champion:75}} + {{champion:268}} vs {{champion:101}}

Had a match where I first timed Thresh 
and the enemy Lucian was taking the lore too seriously , that he kept flaming the shit out of me for killing Sena
and kept spamming " ? " every time , and says " for Sena "
Gimme a break
I remember when Lucian first came out. and every thresh vs Lucian game it was "Thresh 100% wife steal".
that shit is still 100% funny and you will not convince me otherwise
Replace {{champion:516}} with {{champion:26}}

Man i haven't seen that event or the rengar and kha one in ages
nasus vs renekton

It was pretty low key, due to being within the Journal of Justice (really old Lore thing styled as a newspaper), but {{champion:55}} versus {{champion:50}} was a major ongoing (mostly political) battle that later ended with Swain being the High General of Noxus (top seat, for those who didn't know).
I've been {{champion:50}} against {{champion:7}} in mid before. She spammed /laugh, I spammed /taunt, good times ;D
renekton and nasus dumb ass lol
Ok, that Kled one made me chuckle.
